name: Underwater Snake
description:
First-year games development with C++ project to create a game based around the classic game Snake.

  • The snakes need to eat as much food as possible.
  • The snakes cannot breathe underwater but that is the only location of the food.
  • The water level is decreasing.
  • Space is getting smaller and smaller so if the snake collides with another snake, the longer snake will eat the smaller snake.
  • If the snake collides with itself, it will die.
  • Game over is when the water has depleted.
